definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, notably borne by Nick Clegg, a British politician who served as Deputy Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2010 to 2015.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英格兰的姓氏，著名人物包括尼克·克雷格，他曾于2010年至2015年担任英国副首相。
definitions.example_en: Nick Clegg announced his resignation after the Liberal Democrats suffered heavy losses in the general election.
definitions.example_cn: 自由民主党在大选中惨败后，尼克·克雷格宣布辞职。
